Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's value to you. Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier solution. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
